project.component: { "keyToString": { ".NET Launch Settings Profile.DistributedLock: http.executor": "Run", ".NET Launch Settings Profile.RapidFireDashboard: http.executor": "Debug", "ASKED_ADD_EXTERNAL_FILES": "true", "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "org.jetbrains.plugins.github.ui.GithubSettingsConfigurable", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" }, "keyToStringList": { "rider.external.source.directories": [ "/Users/fabriziopaino/Library/Application Support/JetBrains/Rider2024.1/resharper-host/DecompilerCache", "/Users/fabriziopaino/Library/Application Support/JetBrains/Rider2024.1/resharper-host/SourcesCache", "/Users/fabriziopaino/Library/Application Support/Symbols/src" ] } }

task.summary:
Add HealthCheck service, remove WeatherForecast from DistributedLock
Introduced a new HealthCheck service with its own project file and program script. Removed the WeatherForecast class under DistributedLock service as it was not necessary. The HealthCheck service comes with setup for OpenAPI and Swagger for simple API testing.

Add initial Razor Pages and Layouts
This commit added the basic foundational pages and layouts needed for the application. This includes Razor pages for Home, Weather, and Counter. Layouts for MainLayout and NavMenu were also added with their respective CSS styling. The index.html was updated with appropriate references.

Update workspace.xml and enhance feature set
Workspace.xml has been updated to reflect recent changes in project structure and configuration. Addition of profiles for the RapidFireDashboard has been made in the AutoGeneratedRunConfigurationManager section. Settings for GitHub, ProjectColorInfo, and PropertiesComponent have been updated. Task descriptions are also updated to better represent recent developments.

Update workspace.xml and enhance feature set
This commit updates workspace.xml to reflect changes in project structure and configuration. It adds profiles for RapidFireDashboard in the AutoGeneratedRunConfigurationManager section. The settings for GitHub, ProjectColorInfo, and PropertiesComponent have also been updated, along with better task descriptions.

Update workspace.xml and enhance feature set
This commit includes updates to workspace.xml reflecting changes in project structure and configuration. Profiles were added for RapidFireDashboard in the AutoGeneratedRunConfigurationManager section. Updates were made to the settings for GitHub, ProjectColorInfo, and PropertiesComponent, along with improved task descriptions.

Update workspace.xml and introduce new data access components
The project structure has been updated with the addition of several new components concerning data access. A new file, DataModel.csproj, has been created. Similarly, LockDataAccess.csproj, IDataAccess.csproj, and ILockDataAccess.csproj have been established as part of the Data Access strategy. These changes are further reflected in the update of workspace.xml. Further constituents for data handling like DataLockDBContext.cs and DistributedLock.cs in the DataModel have been added.

Refactor data access and update workspace settings
Reengineered data access using Dapper and SqlConnection instead of Entity Framework. This involves renaming data access configuration class, updating CSProj and Workspace files. Additionally, added new SQL Scripts and updated DistributedLock class and IDataLockDbContext interface to fit with new implementations. Updating workspace settings in multiple sections including external source directories, run manager, recent temporary and others also took place.

Refactor data access and update workspace settings
Reimplemented data access using Dapper and SqlConnection instead of Entity Framework. This included updating files and classes related to data access. Workspace settings were also updated in various sections reflecting the changes. Also, added new methods for lock acquisition and release.

Refactor data access and update workspace
Reimplemented data access using Dapper and SqlConnection instead of Entity Framework which involved updating different files and classes. Also, adjusted workspace settings that reflected the aforementioned changes and added new methods for lock acquisition and release. Updated lock timeout setting in DbConnectionSettings.

Update nullability in DistributedLockTest
A nullability annotation has been added to the mockDataLockDbContext setup in the TestReleaseLock_FailWhenLockDoesNotExist method of the DistributedLockTest. This improves clarity regarding the expected nullability of DistributedLock.

Update syntax in multiple code files
Revised syntax in various code files to follow more consistent braces structure. This update was applied to a variety of namespaces, classes, methods, and properties across the project. The modification ensures enhanced code readability and adheres to our coding standards.

Refactor DataLockDbContext constructor
The constructor of the DataLockDbContext class has been simplified and refactored. The previous way of initializing the 'connectionString' and 'LockTimeoutMin' member variables separately inside the constructor was replaced with directly initializing those variables in their declaration using the passed 'dbConnectionSettings' argument.
